We gave them our location and stayed on the phone with them until help arrived . We could hear the sound of the ambulance in the distance . We were relieved to hear that sound . Question: When did the ambulance drive up as close as it could? Option1: when the round was over Option2: After arriving at the golf course.
output: After arriving at the golf course.
